data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Derby County with the kick-off.
At Pride Park Stadium, Graeme Shinnie has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 40, Reading take a 0-1 lead thanks to Lucas Joao.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Derby.
Ovie Ejaria puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Louie Sibley (Derby County) has received a yellow card from Darren Bond.
The second-half has commenced. Reading with the kick-off.
The home team replace Andre Wisdom with Nathan Byrne.
In the minute 47, Nathan Byrne (Derby County) has received a first yellow card.
Wayne Rooney is on a sub for Graeme Shinnie for Derby County.
Michael Olise (Reading) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 68, Sone Aluko is replacing Ovie Ejaria for the away team.
The away team have replaced John Swift with Sam Baldock. This is the second substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
Tom Holmes is replacing Michael Olise for Reading at Pride Park Stadium.
Darren Bond blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
Reading's Omar Richards has been booked in Derby.
